fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 39.75 points or 0.21% to settle at 18,755.90. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 0.47% to 11.16. Reliance Industries (RIL), HDFC Bank and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The June 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 June 2023.
